# Advection

Properties are carried with the fluid.

```{julia}
#| label: fig-advection
#| fig-cap: "Temperature distribution moving with fluid"
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show the code"

using Plots

@gif for i ∈ 1:62
    plot(
        x -> 0.5 * sin(x - 0.1 * i),
        xlims=(0, 4π),
        ylims=(-1, 1),
        label="temperature",
        xlabel="displacement",
    )
end

```
